code: import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:5000'});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem('profile')){req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')).token);}return req;});var noteURL='http://localhost:5000/note';export var signIn=function signIn(formData){return API.post('/user/signin',formData);};export var signUp=function signUp(formData){return API.post('/user/signup',formData);};export var create_contact=function create_contact(newContact){return API.post('/contacts',newContact);};export var get_all_contacts=function get_all_contacts(){return API.get('/contacts');};export var delete_contact=function delete_contact(id){return API.post("/contacts/delete/".concat(id));};export var update_contact=function update_contact(id,contact){return API.patch("contacts/update/".concat(id),contact);};export var get_contact=function get_contact(id){return API.get('/contacts/:id');};export var createNote=function createNote(userText,history){return API.post('/note/add',userText,history);};export var get_allNotes=function get_allNotes(){return API.get('note/get_all');};export var updateNote=function updateNote(id,updatedNote){return API.patch("".concat(noteURL,"/update/").concat(id),updatedNote);};export var deleteNote=function deleteNote(id){return API.delete("".concat(noteURL,"/delete/").concat(id));};export var sendEmail=function sendEmail(formData){return API.post('/email/send',formData);};export var linkEmail=function linkEmail(formData){return API.post('email/link',formData);};
